articles.title: Trump Initiates National Security Investigation on Lumber Imports
articles.description: President Trump orders a new probe into U.S. lumber imports, potentially increasing tariffs. This ties into existing U.S.-Canada trade tensions and involves potential tariffs on Canadian and Mexican goods. The investigation aims to bolster American timber production and address national security concerns over reliance on imported lumber.
articles.content:

articles.title: White House Showdown: Trump vs. Zelenskiy Alters U.S. Aid Fate
articles.description: A heated exchange between Ukrainian President Zelenskiy and former U.S. President Trump at the White House raised questions about future U.S. support for Ukraine. The clash left a significant minerals deal unsigned, impacting bilateral relations.
